testcase.name: Login, add a new product, search product, add to cart, and checkout
testcase.classname: Successful login to Admin portal and add a new product
testcase.system-out: @PositiveFlow @Regression @AdminFlow Scenario Outline: Login, add a new product, search product, add to cart, and checkout # file:///C:/Users/seeni/IdeaProjects/ShopHub/src/main/resources/Features/Admin-Login.feature:33 Hooks @Before - Scenario: Login, add a new product, search product, add to cart, and checkout Hooks Initializing browser: chrome Given Admin is on the login page # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_is_on_the_login_page() When Admin enters valid email "admin@shophub.com" and password "admin123" # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_enters_valid_email_and_password(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And Admin clicks the login button # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_clicks_the_login_button() Login successful. Then Admin should be redirected to the home page # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_should_be_redirected_to_the_home_page() When Admin clicks on the Admin panel # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_clicks_on_the_admin_panel() And Admin adds a new product with name "Bluetooth Mouse" # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_adds_a_new_product_with_name(java.lang.String) And Admin selects category "Electronics" and enters price "499" # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_selects_category_and_enters_price(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And Admin enters initial stock "20" and product description "Wireless optical mouse" # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_enters_initial_stock_and_product_description(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then Admin clicks the Add Product button # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_clicks_the_add_product_button() Then Admin click the all Products section # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_click_the_all_products_section() When Admin clicks on the search bar # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_clicks_on_the_search_bar() And Admin types "Bluetooth Mouse" into the search bar # stepdefinitions.AdminSteps.admin_types_into_the_search_bar(java.lang.String) And clicks the search button # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.clicks_the_search_button() Product was found should be displayed: Bluetooth Mouse Then Products related to "Bluetooth Mouse" should be displayed # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.products_related_to_should_be_displayed(java.lang.String) Product was found should be displayed: Add to Cart When User clicks "Add to Cart" on a displayed product # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.user_clicks_add_to_cart_on_a_displayed_product(java.lang.String) org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: no such element: Unable to locate element: {"method":"xpath","selector":"//body/div[@id='mainApp']/div[@id='mainLayout']/aside[@class='cart']/div[@id='cartItems']/div[1]"} (Session info: chrome=138.0.7204.184) For documentation on this error, please visit: https://www.selenium.dev/documentation/webdriver/troubleshooting/errors#no-such-element-exception Build info: version: '4.34.0', revision: '707dcb4246*' System info: os.name: 'Windows 11', os.arch: 'amd64', os.version: '10.0', java.version: '24.0.1' Driver info: org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver Command: [f19ecbeb7b8605ee62794d7cb644e6d4, findElement {using=xpath, value=//body/div[@id='mainApp']/div[@id='mainLayout']/aside[@class='cart']/div[@id='cartItems']/div[1]}] Capabilities {acceptInsecureCerts: false, browserName: chrome, browserVersion: 138.0.7204.184, chrome: {chromedriverVersion: 138.0.7204.183 (e90faf484dd..., userDataDir: C:\Users\seeni\AppData\Loca...}, fedcm:accounts: true, goog:chromeOptions: {debuggerAddress: localhost:56659}, networkConnectionEnabled: false, pageLoadStrategy: normal, platformName: windows, proxy: Proxy(), se:cdp: ws://localhost:56659/devtoo..., se:cdpVersion: 138.0.7204.184, setWindowRect: true, strictFileInteractability: false, timeouts: {implicit: 0, pageLoad: 300000, script: 30000}, unhandledPromptBehavior: dismiss and notify, webauthn:extension:credBlob: true, webauthn:extension:largeBlob: true, webauthn:extension:minPinLength: true, webauthn:extension:prf: true, webauthn:virtualAuthenticators: true} Session ID: f19ecbeb7b8605ee62794d7cb644e6d4 Then The product should be added to the shopping cart # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.the_product_should_be_added_to_the_shopping_cart() When User clicks on the cart icon # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.user_clicks_on_the_cart_icon() price is :541.41 Then The cart summary should display the added product with the correct price # testcase.name: User successfully creates a new account with valid details
testcase.classname: Successful Shopping Journey for User and Guest User
testcase.system-out: @PositiveFlow @Regression @NewUser Scenario: User successfully creates a new account with valid details # file:///C:/Users/seeni/IdeaProjects/ShopHub/src/main/resources/Features/Login-Positive.feature:30 Hooks @Before - Scenario: User successfully creates a new account with valid details Hooks Initializing browser: chrome Given User is on the Create New Account page # stepdefinitions.NewUserSteps.user_is_on_the_create_new_account_page() When User enters a valid "First Name" and "last Name" # stepdefinitions.NewUserSteps.user_enters_a_valid_and(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And User enters a valid email "Email Address" # stepdefinitions.NewUserSteps.user_enters_a_valid_email(java.lang.String) And User enters a valid password "Password" # stepdefinitions.NewUserSteps.user_enters_a_valid_password(java.lang.String) And User enters the same "Password" in the Confirm Password field # stepdefinitions.NewUserSteps.user_enters_the_same_in_the_confirm_password_field(java.lang.String) Then User enters a valid Number "Phone Number" # stepdefinitions.NewUserSteps.user_enters_a_valid_number(java.lang.String) And User agrees to the Terms and Conditions # stepdefinitions.NewUserSteps.user_agrees_to_the_terms_and_conditions() And User clicks on the Create Account button # stepdefinitions.NewUserSteps.user_clicks_on_the_create_account_button() Order placed notification not found or not visible.
